step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_POI (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_POI P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_LINE (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_LINE P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_PLATFORM (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_PLATFORM P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_STRAND (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_STRAND P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_COMPANY (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_COMPANY P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_SYSTEM (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_SYSTEM P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_ETA_ACCESS (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_ETA_ACCESS P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_ETA_STOP (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_ETA_STOP P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_ETA_LINE (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_ETA_LINE P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_PT_TRANSFER (PID) (SELECT P.AUDATA_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_TRANSFER P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);

SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_POI_PARENT P, AU_PT_POI_CHILDREN PC, TEMP_PT_POI R WHERE PC.AUDATA_ID = R.PID AND P.GROUP_ID=PC.GROUP_ID UNION SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_POI_PARENT P, TEMP_PT_POI R WHERE P.AUDATA_ID = R.PID ;

SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_POI_CHILDREN P,TEMP_PT_POI R WHERE P.AUDATA_ID = R.PID UNION SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_POI_CHILDREN P,AU_PT_POI_PARENT PA,TEMP_PT_POI R WHERE PA.AUDATA_ID = R.PID AND P.GROUP_ID=PA.GROUP_ID ;
SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_PLATFORM P, TEMP_PT_PLATFORM R WHERE P.AUDATA_ID = R.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_PLATFORM_NAME P, TEMP_PT_PLATFORM T WHERE P.AUDATA_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_TRANSFER P, TMAU_EXP_AU_PT_TRANSFER T WHERE P.AUDATA_ID=T.AUDATA_ID AND T.BATCH_ID [batch];
SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_PLATFORM_ACCESS P, TEMP_PT_PLATFORM T WHERE P.AUDATA_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AU_PT_STRAND_PLATFORM P, TEMP_PT_STRAND T WHERE P.AUDATA_ID=T.PID
